data.name: Gridiron - Gold Package
data.detailed_description: The Gold Package contains 7,500 G Coins. G Coins are the premium in-game currency of Gridiron and can be used to purchase premium character skins, shield skins, football skins & trails, touchdown celebrations, and more!
data.about_the_game: The Gold Package contains 7,500 G Coins. G Coins are the premium in-game currency of Gridiron and can be used to purchase premium character skins, shield skins, football skins & trails, touchdown celebrations, and more!
data.short_description: The Gold Package contains 7,500 G Coins($50 value) FOR FREE FOR ALL PLAYERS(until June 30th, 2022). G Coins are the premium in-game currency of Gridiron and can be used to purchase premium character skins, shield skins, football skins & trails, touchdown celebrations, and more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual-core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 760 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 3.0+ GHz Quad-core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 470, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
